mapper.select: select * from Income_T where incEvent like concat('%', '${incEvent}', '%') order by incDatetime DESC
select * from Income_T where incType = #{incType} order by incDatetime DESC
select * from Income_T where userNo = #{userNo} order by incDatetime DESC
select * from Income_T order by userNo, incDatetime DESC
